div.h1: Steps to send the data from Kepware
div.p: It is highly recommended that you deploy a universal forwarder on the machine that Kepware is sitting on as the Universal Forwarder allows for SSL,Connection loss buffering and many more functions. Here's a screenshot of Kepware with the OPC Client Runnning

ol.li: Open the downloaded OPF file or your own OPF.
Ensure that on Kepware, the IDF is connected and running on the default port 51112 and pointing to the correct Splunk Instance. Thatâ€™s it!
